author: vmassol
msg: updates the changes to reflect the integration of HttpUnit in the end method

author: vmassol
msg: deprecated ServletTestRequest (replaced by WebRequest) + deprecated signature endXXX(HttpURLConnection) and replaced by two possibilities : endXXX(org.apache.commons.cactus.WebResponse) or endXXX(com.meterware.httpunit.WebResponse) + deprecated AssertUtils (moved to WebResponse) + build now needs HttpUnit jar + added unit tests for AbstractTestCase (needed to create a mock of HttpURLConnection to do so)

author: vmassol
msg: The Cactus runservertests custom Ant task will now not stop the server if it was running before the task was executed. This is to allow to run and rerun Cactus tests without starting/stopping the server every time you run the tests. Thanks to Paul Dillon (paul.dillon@solnet.com.au) for this suggestion

author: vmassol
msg: provide workaround to stopping tomcat 3.3 when a custom AJP 12 port is used, by using StopTomcat instead of Main and specifying the ajp12 file on the command line.
